properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 9:23AM CST until January 18 at 9:45AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...

.Recent rainfall has resulted in rises along the Black Warrior River.
The Selden Lock and Dam river point remains in minor flood stage.
The latest forecast crest has been revised downward, but the river
is still expected to crest Thursday morning. A gradual fall should
begin Thursday afternoon through the upcoming weekend.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* until Saturday morning...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  9:00 AM Wednesday the stage was 89.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this afternoon and continue to
rise to near 93 feet by tomorrow early afternoon . The river will
fall below flood stage by Friday night.
* Impact...At 94.0 feet...Some secondary roads in the area begin to
flood. Flooding of farm and pasture lands continues.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
